txt.en:
'I must say, even such a grand feast makes me long for the comforts of the Shire.

'Did you find what I asked for? Oh good, good. I do hope it wasn't too much trouble, [placeholder]!

'Now... where to begin?'
Frodo is deciding where to begin his tale of adventure.

Frodo Baggins can be found in Merethrond in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nYou have collected the writing-quill, phial of ink, and parchment. You should deliver them to Frodo at the wedding banquet in Merethrond.
Wait for Frodo to decide how to start his tale of adventure

With the One Ring destroyed and the Enemy undone, the Free Peoples of Middle-earth gather to Minas Tirith for a grand banquet commemorating the wedding of King Aragorn II Elessar to Queen Arwen Und√≥miel. Among the many who have attended, there sits a hobbit of unequalled renown -- Frodo Baggins, the Nine-fingered.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Frodo lets out a long sigh and chuckles to himself

Frodo Baggins can be found in Merethrond in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nAfter delivering a quill, ink, and parchment to Frodo Baggins, he appears to have found himself unable to write. You should talk to Frodo.

'I suppose I should just enjoy the banquet tonight, shouldn't I?

'I thought I'd so much to say, but the words just will not come to me right now.

'Thank you all the same, [placeholder]. I hope you enjoy the rest of the banquet, and I will be sure to tell you when I finish my tale!'
Dark ink swirls inside the phial

'Good evening to you, [placeholder]! How have you been enjoying the banquet?

'To my mind, it is hard to recall a more pleasant night in recent memory.'

Frodo shifts in his seat.

'Even so, I have been thinking on all that has happened since I left the Shire. I was wondering what Uncle Bilbo would make of all this business, and that has given me an idea. Uncle Bilbo kept a diary, so why shouldn't I write of my own adventures?

'Could you find me a quill and a phial of ink? Oh, and a few sheets of parchment!'
The quill is well-used, but kept in good care

Writing-quills, phials of ink, and sheets of parchment might be found in either the Houses of Lore or the Blue Theatre.\n\nFrodo has asked you to gather a writing-quill, a phial of ink, and some sheets of parchment that he might begin to write on his adventures.
Deliver the quill, ink, and parchment to Frodo in Merethrond
